description: Katou Ken is a ronin seeking help from the http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya]. He asks for help in finding money to buy back his house. After that, he tells them about all his misfortunes that happened a month ago (loosing his job, house, and family). After he got bullied by http://anidb.net/ch6290 [Buu] and http://anidb.net/ch6291 [Shimomoto], he changed his request to becoming stronger.
name: Katou Ken
